name: Chemical Engineering
tagline: Transforming molecules into innovative solutions for a sustainable future

overview.introduction: The Department of Chemical Engineering provides education and research opportunities in the principles of chemical engineering and their applications to real-world problems.
overview.description: Our curriculum combines theoretical knowledge with practical skills in areas such as process design, reaction engineering, separation processes, and plant design. We emphasize sustainable practices and environmentally friendly processes throughout our teaching and research activities. The department maintains strong ties with the chemical and petrochemical industries in the region.

programs.name: B.Tech in Chemical Engineering
programs.description: Comprehensive undergraduate program covering fundamental principles and applications of chemical engineering processes.

labs.name: Unit Operations Laboratory
labs.description: Well-equipped lab for hands-on experience with various unit operations in chemical engineering.

labs.name: Process Control Laboratory
labs.description: Modern laboratory for learning control systems used in chemical plants.
